get

void get(com.tobesoft.xplatform.data.VariableList inVl,

         com.tobesoft.xplatform.data.VariableList outVl,
         com.tobesoft.xplatform.data.DataSetList outDl)
         throws Exception
This is the method for inquiring using VariableList and DataSet.

Parameters:
inVl - VariableList including the query id or query condition etc.
inDl - The DataSet list including query conditions
outVl - Output VaiableList including return values.
outDl - Output DataSetList including return values.
Throws:
Exception - if there is any problem getting the DataSet
